Detailed Description

Dbus universal listener api.

Function Documentation

int dbus_provider_add_listener ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct,
dbus_name_add_t  add_name,
dbus_name_release_t  release_name,
dbus_message_handler_t  handle_message 
)

Add listener (component wanting to listen for messages) to provider The provider loop should not run upon this call

Parameters:
settins_struct initialized struct of provider which doesn't run
add_name function to call to add component names to connection
release_name function to call to remove component names to connection
handle_message function to call on received message (try) to handle it
Returns:
TRUE if added, FALSE otherwise
See also:
dbus_name_add_t

dbus_name_release_t

dbus_message_handler_t

int dbus_provider_end ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct  ) 

Stop listening thread and close dbus connection

Parameters:
settings_struct valid pointer to running provider struct
Returns:
TRUE if terminated, FALSE otherwise

int dbus_provider_init ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct  ) 

Initialize dbus provider struct

Parameters:
settings_struct valid pointer to uninitialized settings struct
Returns:
TRUE if sucessfully initialized (FALSE otherwise)

void* dbus_provider_loop ( void *  data  ) 

Dbus provider loop. waits for messages and call handlers on them. Just receive messages, doesn't do initialization or finalization To stop the loop, set the settings->connection to NULL.

Parameters:
data pointer to initialized dbus_state_holder
Returns:
NULL

int dbus_provider_start ( dbus_state_holder  settings_struct,
DBusBusType  bus_type 
)

Open dbus connection and dispatch listening thread

Parameters:
settins_struct initialized provider struct with added listeners (not running)
bus_type on which bus to listen (system, session or what)
TRUE if thread started, FALSE otherwise
